content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position (43.0, -82.0) and a Chest at position (42.5, -83.5) to store the mined coal.

### Coal Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0) to smelt coal into other products, but currently has no ingredients to smelt.

### Coal Transport System
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) that picks up coal from the Chest at position (44.5, -81.5) and drops it into the Chest at position (43.5, -79.5), but is currently waiting for space in the destination chest.

### Coal Storage at position (43.5, -79.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (43.5, -79.5) that stores coal, but is currently full.

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Make sure the chest is not empty before attempting to extract items.
- Ensure the agent has the necessary permissions to extract items from the chest.
### Errors when using a Burner Mining Drill
- Make sure the drill has enough fuel to operate.
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before attempting to mine.
### Errors when using a Burner Inserter
- Make sure the inserter has enough fuel to operate.
- Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before attempting to insert items.
### Errors when using a Furnace
- Make sure the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt.
- Ensure the furnace is fueled and operational before attempting to smelt.
